name: project-cardiology
description: Cardiology project for the Almond team

scripts.build: npm run buildDoctor && npm run buildPatient && npm run buildPublic
scripts.buildDoctor: npm run copyDoctor && npm run zipDoctor && npm run cleanDoctor
scripts.copyDoctor: mkdir doctor_zip && cp doctor/device.js doctor_zip/ && cp doctor/package.json doctor_zip/
scripts.buildPatient: npm run copyPatient && npm run zipPatient && npm run cleanPatient
scripts.copyPatient: mkdir patient_zip && cp patient/device.js patient_zip/ && cp patient/package.json patient_zip/
scripts.buildPublic: npm run copyPublic && npm run zipPublic && npm run cleanPublic
scripts.copyPublic: mkdir public_zip && cp public/device.js public_zip/ && cp public/package.json public_zip/

author: Ricky Grannis-Vu, Elvis Zhang
